name: Sprightlife
overview:
Sprightlife is a service built to encourage people to discover, try and share experiences in an effort to enhance the way that they live. Users can find experiences based on the people they would like to share them with. So if you’re looking for an experience that you can share with your sibling, friend or significant other for example, you can do that. If you’re searching for a type of experience that is considered unique or packaged, you can do that as well.

Sprightlife believes in rewarding people without them having to run through hoops tirelessly in order to take advantage of rewards. All active Sprightlife members are by default, enrolled in their perks program which gives random members a chance to win Perks such as free movie and theme park tickets, backstage passes and more simply for being an active Sprightlife member.
